description: sardines.compile-time-tools.js is part of the sardines.io project
name: sardines-compile-time-tools

scripts.buildProd: npm run clearProd && tsc --build conf/tsconfig.prod.json && npm run makeExecProdCompiler && npm run makeExecProdPublisher
scripts.buildDev: npm run clearDev && tsc --build conf/tsconfig.dev.json && npm run makeExecDevCompiler
scripts.makeExecProdCompiler: file=lib/prod/compiler/bin.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chmod a+x $file
scripts.makeExecProdPublisher: file=lib/prod/publisher/bin.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chmod a+x $file
scripts.makeExecDevCompiler: file=lib/dev/compiler/bin.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chomd a+x $file
scripts.makeExecDevPublisher: file=lib/dev/publisher/bin.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chmod a+x $file
